mapper.select: select * from (select pto_request.*, row_number() over (order by pto_seq desc) as rn from pto_request) sub where rn between #{start} and #{end} order by rn
select count(*) from pto_request where member_email = #{email}
select count(*) from pto_request where member_email = #{member_email} and pto_status =#{pto_status}
select * from pto_request where member_email =#{member_email} and pto_status =#{type} order by approval_at desc
select * from pto_request where member_email =#{member_email} and pto_seq =#{seq}
mapper.update: update pto_request set pto_content = #{pto_content}, pto_start_at = #{pto_start_at}, pto_end_at = #{pto_end_at} where pto_seq = #{pto_seq} and member_email = #{member_email}
mapper.delete: delete from pto_request where pto_seq = #{pto_seq} and member_email = #{member_email}
mapper.insert: insert into pto_request (pto_seq, member_email, pto_start_at, pto_end_at, pto_used, pto_content, pto_status) values (pto_request_seq.nextval, #{member_email}, #{pto_start_at}, #{pto_end_at}, #{pto_used}, #{pto_content}, default)
